name: SocialConnectionDiagnosesICD10CM
title: Social Connection Diagnoses ICD10CM
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>
 The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with Social Connection as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD 10 CM diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
